name: Abdominal Pain
description: Tummy pain can be caused by the movement of food through your stomach and intestines, having gas (wind) trapped there, or eating too much.

name: Abnormal vaginal bleeding
description: Abnormal or irregular vaginal bleeding is any bleeding from your vaginal area that is not part of a regular period. It can be caused by infection and hormonal changes, but can also be a symptom of more serious problems.

name: Arthritis
description: Arthritis is a condition which affects your joints, making them stiff, painful and swollen

name: Asthma
description: A person’s asthma triggers cause their airways to tighten, partially close up, swell inside and make more mucus.

severity.mild: The person can speak normally but may have a slight wheeze or mild cough – especially when excited or running
severity.moderate: The person may speak in half sentences; their breathing will be difficult and you may hear them wheezing; and they may have a persistent cough.
severity.severe: They could struggle to breathe; you may be able to see in-drawing (sucking in) of the muscles between their ribs but they may sound quiet (because of reduced air movement,
